title: Permabanned for this? can anyone point out why?
body:
Only has 2 games... nothing actually negative said. Adc was trolling in the first one. And so was his duo. Theres absolutely nothing here on the grounds to punish my account. This is pretty ridiculous. 

Game 1
PrincesitaNemy: invade
PrincesitaNemy: ganking mid
PrincesitaNemy: dont have a choice
PrincesitaNemy: ok ill tower dive
PrincesitaNemy: good
PrincesitaNemy: yhou did that fight
PrincesitaNemy: you doidnt go in
PrincesitaNemy: until i almost killd her
PrincesitaNemy: when it was too late
PrincesitaNemy: good hoice dude
PrincesitaNemy: instead of getting a kill
PrincesitaNemy: you wait
PrincesitaNemy: for me to fight
PrincesitaNemy: muted
PrincesitaNemy: dude is feeding on purpose
PrincesitaNemy: yeah i was, i was mid
PrincesitaNemy: already did and not talking
PrincesitaNemy: she*
PrincesitaNemy: grag that was a pro dodge
PrincesitaNemy: 10/10
PrincesitaNemy: accident or legit?
PrincesitaNemy: lol
PrincesitaNemy: dude that was awesome
PrincesitaNemy: then stop talking at least
PrincesitaNemy: oh look hes not afking, yay
PrincesitaNemy: its fine guys we got this
PrincesitaNemy: have you tried not being toxic? that usually has a positive effect on ppl :)
PrincesitaNemy: sigh, toxic players ruin this game =\
PrincesitaNemy: it was over when at 2 min you tilted and said to report me lol
PrincesitaNemy: tthen afked 3 separate times
PrincesitaNemy: well because im an adult, and civil. I can talk and speak as i please. I am not using curse language or insults
PrincesitaNemy: i did
PrincesitaNemy: you afked
PrincesitaNemy: 3 times
PrincesitaNemy: why would i not cs when my adc is afking?
PrincesitaNemy: plz dont play anymore. you are ruining hte community
PrincesitaNemy: you have 9 deaths too...
PrincesitaNemy: nope
PrincesitaNemy: nope
Game 2
PrincesitaNemy: sydra still build full ap
PrincesitaNemy: ill get site stone
PrincesitaNemy: no
PrincesitaNemy: site
PrincesitaNemy: like
PrincesitaNemy: "it's site"
PrincesitaNemy: its a pun
PrincesitaNemy: :9
PrincesitaNemy: :(
PrincesitaNemy: hes trolling
PrincesitaNemy: so if you all could kidly report this guy, hes also talking very toxic
PrincesitaNemy: wow so much fun
PrincesitaNemy: we have al egendary draven...
PrincesitaNemy: not worth gold
PrincesitaNemy: lol syndra i like the balls you ahve
PrincesitaNemy: its funny
PrincesitaNemy: and cute
PrincesitaNemy: ill be full tank for dravn
PrincesitaNemy: dont surr
PrincesitaNemy: make him stay
PrincesitaNemy: morg is trolling too
PrincesitaNemy: we have late game
PrincesitaNemy: lol
PrincesitaNemy: be sure not to leave without reporting morg and ivern
PrincesitaNemy: they will get perma banned

replies.body: Did you have a 14 day ban before this?
Yes, but pretty much for the same thing. There is no cause to ban me on that one either. Its just premades will report as a group and thats all that is needed apparently

Just so I'm clear here. You received a 14 day ban for doing the exact same thing as this punishment?

Does it not seem a bit silly to keep behaving the same way that earned the 14 day ban, especially after said ban explicitly states the next punishment is a permaban?
Not correct, only 1 report triggers a review, any extra reports do nothing. That is how riot always has done things
Even if thats true. My account was never reviewed. Because there is nothing here that breaks any rules.

Yea this is dumb. This is just as toxic as like spamming pings, shouldnt be permed for this no matter the context. Then again, you could have posted a chat of you just saying "hi guys" and they'd still find a way to say the ban was justified.

After a 14 day suspension, it is made extremely clear that the next suspension is permanent.

People are not permitted to keep being "mildly" toxic forever. Riot requires them to either improve their behavior or they will be kicked out.

He claims that the 14 day suspension was for the same reason(s) or similar reasons to this one. This isn't toxic and that word is thrown around too lightly now in my opinion, people know what toxicity really is because they've experienced it and this isn't it. This is just someone playing the game. The claims for the ban were:

"That he was being passive aggressive", I geuss this might be slightly true? 

"He told someone to uninstall." Not true and taken out of context completely, he told someone who was playing that he was a toxic influence and he hopes not to see him in another game. Everyone has said something around these lines.

"Asking for reports". I cant even find any readon that someone would think this is bannable.

I check this board pretty much everyday and this is the first post I have ever agreed with. If he was super toxic for his 14 day suspension, then I could kinda understand this. But he claims the 14 day suspension were around the same points as this one, and in that case I frankly can't see him worthy of never playing on his account again just for that. Would I ever say something like this? Of course not, I hardly type as it is, but having a teamate say this would'nt lesson my experience at all. Sorry for the long response.

Again, it’s not "is this worthy of a permanent suspension" but more of a "have chat restrictions improved the behavior".

If a player doesn’t improve on chat restrictions, they are issued a suspension (14 days) as a kick in the rear to improve their behavior. If they still don’t improve, they get kicked out. **Riot does not allow people to just keep being mildly toxic forever and get slaps  on the wrist."**
I'm saying that this shouldn't warrant a chat restriction imo.

Normally, just by itself, it wouldn't. You would have to establish a pattern of this happening and do it consistently in order to first even break into chat restrictions.

However, OP had just come off of a 14 day ban. They explicitly state that it is your final warning, and that the next punishment is a permanent ban. Once you are on that last step, all it takes is one validated instance of toxicity to get you banned. In this case, it normally wouldn't have caused anything, but given the behavior history, there was no leniency.
You were being really passive aggressive in that chat. If you just recovered from a 14 day suspension before this, then sorry. A permabanned is justified as you didn't learn from before.

I was not being passive aggressive. I was doing my best to be civil. And I even tried explaining that. This is NOT a reason to permaban an account. Name one thing in there that breaks any rule? You cant. 
And the 2 week suspension was just as ridiculous as these reasons. A premade 4 man reports you and it automatically takes... It's not right

> [{quoted}](name=PrincesitaNemy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ckWzwExf,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-09-20T15:13:09.963+0000)
>
> I was not being passive aggressive. I was doing my best to be civil. And I even tried explaining that. This is NOT a reason to permaban an account. 

You were.

> PrincesitaNemy: good hoice dude
> PrincesitaNemy: instead of getting a kill
> PrincesitaNemy: you wait
> PrincesitaNemy: for me to fight

> PrincesitaNemy: oh look hes not afking, yay

> PrincesitaNemy: sigh, toxic players ruin this game =\

And then basically telling someone to uninstall

> PrincesitaNemy: plz dont play anymore. you are ruining hte community

And begging for reports to get people banned (Harrasment)

> PrincesitaNemy: be sure not to leave without reporting morg and ivern
> PrincesitaNemy: they will get perma banned
You are obviously trolling me. So I am no longer going to respond to you. Please stop.

For what it’s worth, and at the risk of you calling me a troll as well, I agree with their analysis of your chat logs.

Regardless of if you agree with the punishment or not, or with Riot’s escalation of punishment policy, we are trying to explain why the punishment was issued.

You do not have to agree, that is fine. But at least try to understand what you’re disagreeing with.

> [{quoted}](name=PrincesitaNemy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ckWzwExf,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2017-09-20T15:22:23.260+0000)
>
> You are obviously trolling me. So I am no longer going to respond to you. Please stop.

Suit yourself. You asked what got you banned, pointed it out for you. Take it as you will.
You are completely missing the point. None of the summoner rules were broken. Period. You are only stating an opinion.

This is untrue. It takes one report to review a game. More reports do nothing. There is no automatic punishment based on number of reports, each reported game is reviewed no matter how many reports are made in it.

This is happening more and more, Riot has literally just gone fucking crazy.
Riot is just stealing money/accounts from people for just simple arguing....
Not toxic, just negative by their opinion and their moarls.
You know why this is happening it's because Riot is banning all the people who actually want to win.
This is an esport right? You know what happens mid match where your team is sitting on the ground or scoring on your own team. The other team mates are going to call them out in this.
This game kicked anyone frustrated trying to WIN in competitive eSports for being frustrated by the environment of don't have to try and then report people for being mad.
I'm not talking about using bad language and attacking others being OK but Riot is literally banning people for being negative in the cesspool low elo is now. 
Its because of all the banning that just makes it worse, fuking people just go yolo on a new account the and not take once riot has stolen away all the skins and champs and just says it's cool you can just make another account though.
When you have games so uncontrollable you can que up just sit around in games and win the games your going to win and lose the games your going to lose.
The Yasuo mid won't stop feeding OH Zed Mids snowballing 5 mins in gud luck stopping him from having free kills on bot or top lane now.
Thanks mid for not playing safe like we asked.
Oh you're negative Banned!
That's league of legends now
Pretty much. I was banned instantly after the 2nd game on there. There was no review or anything, because no one can review that in 1 minute.
Telling someone not to play anymore and asking for reports are both toxic, no matter your word choice.
If I report anyone who says "report blank" they will get striked?

It counts as harassment, yes. Reason being that multiple reports don't do anything more than a single one. Now just doing that by itself with no prior history won't likely lead to a punishment though.

you were pretty passive aggressive and fed the flames and kept going on and on with them. if you just had a 2 wk ban, then you were going to be permaed this time. 

im not sure why people think baiting and trolling in chat isnt toxic. whats the point of making your team more angry with you?
